website_summaries.verdict: Word of mouth turned this Avon product into a highly recommended insect repellent, and it does seem to work well. Affordable and pleasant smelling alternative to DEET-heavy insect repellents.
pros: Lotion contains both a sunscreen and insect repellent
cons: Can damage certain kinds of clothing and plastic
More effective as sunscreen than insect repellent

customer_reviews.title: 4oz bottle has LESS than 3oz worth of sunscreen!!
customer_reviews.text: Guys, I feel cheated! I got a bottle couple months ago and I was getting ready for a trip. When I transferred the sunscreen to the travel size bottle, the whole 4oz bottle of sunscreen does not even fill my 3oz container! we’ve always like this sunscreen but i can’t believe they cheated the amount on this...
customer_reviews.author: K&C Chiu

customer_reviews.title: She gets bad reactions from mosquito bites and I've tried so many ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that works for my 6 year old daughter! She gets bad reactions from mosquito bites and I've tried so many repellents. I love that this is also a sunscreen! I highly recommend this product and I will continue to buy this for as long as they sell it.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Possible allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old had bugs at school so got this spf bug repellent. After a few days she developed a rash only in the areas I had applied — legs and arms, not chest and back. However, I still believe people should try this product. Avon skin so soft lotion was what I Religiously sent to my sister when she was in the peace corps in Africa. It really works, just not for my 4yr old. Lesson learned.. patch test friends!
customer_reviews.author: R Kim

customer_reviews.title: One tube - three uses - and good at all of them
customer_reviews.text: moisturizer, sun protection, and wards off bugs all in one. This is the best of the best. Nothing else is as good. Use it for one of the reasons. Use it for all three at the same time. It's worth it to always keep some on hand. I find that one bottle lasts one person who is outside a fair amount all summer long. I use it at home, in the woods and at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: not original formula
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they use Skin-So-Soft as the name. This is a insect repellent in lotion form. I think it worked fine, but since I used it in conjunction with other products not sure. I used as a deterrent for chiggers and they weren't a problem when I used theis lotion. However, skin-so-soft original formula would have been an insecticide free option if that is what you are looking for. This product has insecticide which is applied directly to your skin if that is a concern for you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cannavo

customer_reviews.title: No sunburn and no mosquitoes... Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a vacation in Maine this summer. My family and I used it almost everyday while hiking. I was extremely impressed with the results. The lotion does not go on as oily as other products. I was doubtful the insect repellent would work but, to my surprise,it worked extremely well. One day, I decided to not use it to see if the results were true. I was the only one with bugs around me while the rest of my family was fine. I quickly put some on and was ok for the rest of the day. The best part is no one got sunburn and no nasty mosquito bites.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I put this product on before going to a wooded part of a park, because I knew there would be mosquitos. I had to leave early because I was being bitten so much. The bugs were landing right where I had applied the product directly. It does nothing and since this product is not eligible for returns, I'm stuck with it. Do not buy this waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: The repellent is about to expire...and it's not returnable
customer_reviews.text: The repellent is about to expire...the tube was dirty and seems worn. And it is not returnable, so please be aware of it before you order.
customer_reviews.author: Magnifico

customer_reviews.title: It Does All Three So Well
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Skin-so-Soft bath oil to repel mosquitos in the 70's when living in South Florida. It worked like nothing else so I thought I'd give this product a shot. I mainly wanted the insect repellent aspect and because it was also a sunscreen with a moisturizer to counteract the drying effect of sunscreens, I gave it a try. Noseeums and mosquitos seek me out even when non one else is being bothered and I never had a bite as long as I used this product on the exposed areas of my arms, legs and neck. I've ordered several tubes and will get more next summer. I highly recommend Skin-so-Soft Bug Guard Plus.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sides

customer_reviews.title: Good sun screen but bad bug repellent.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my camping trip on the advice of coworkers and my GF. (Who warned me it was a different label from what she remembers.) I liked it because it was a bug repellent, sun screen, and lotion all in one. And It did smell good. It did nothing to repel bugs however. They were constantly around us. It did smell good and we didn't get burned so it did half of it's job. But as a bug repellent it pretty much failed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Meahl

customer_reviews.title: Truly the Best
customer_reviews.text: Combination sunscreen bug repellant? Heck yeah!! I recently bought a couple bottles of this stuff for a long trip to Panama. Sadly, I did not buy enough. While I wore it, I felt impervious to the tiny biting flies there. One day I sweated a bunch and most of it came off, resulting in a massacre of my ankles and wrists. There are probably better individual sunscreens and maybe bug repellants, but the ease and effectiveness of Skin So Soft being all-in-one makes this my choice. Once I had bites, it was nice to have only one thing to apply to cover my bases, so to speak.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Sollars

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Mosquitos out here in Yellowstone National Park, didn't work. I was hoping that it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this works!
customer_reviews.text: this works! i'm in south florida, so mosquitoes are active all year. i used to get bitten and couldn't sleep, because of itching. now i put this lotion, go cut grass and those bastards fly over and probably vomit on me, but don't bite!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Eric Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Oxybenzone product!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this item is not return-eligible which is disappointing as I soon discovered on arrival that the active sunscreen ingredient is the much discussed and discouraged oxybenzone (hazardous to the environment per reports as well as being a possible carcinogen). There was no mention of it on the Amazon site. My intention was to use on kids as a bug repellent. With this discovery I will be throwing in the trash instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't protect me hardly at all
customer_reviews.text: We used this the one time we were able to get out of town to go paddling. I remember SSS from back in the day and was looking forward to reliving the smell. Nope. Doesn't smell remotely the same. Well, at least it'll protect me from the sun. NOPE. I reapplied 3x in 3 1/2 hours and my arms were almost sunburned (I'm NOT fair skinned) and I didn't notice any less bugs flying around me than normal. Definitely won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CoveGirl

customer_reviews.title: Handy for camping!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! We camped by lake which was swarmed with mosquitos and I can say that I was not bit once! The only ones that got bit was my son (twice) because I had not applied the lotion and my husband who thought he “didn’t need it” lol. We literally saw mosquitos land on our shirts but not our skin. I highly recommend shaking the bottle when you are getting ready to use it because I found it separating. Just give a quick second shake. The scent is soft, nothing overwhelming and it works as sunblock!
customer_reviews.author: J_Do07

customer_reviews.title: I Panic When I Run Out of this Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely allergic to bug bites of any kind, especially on my legs. I get scars that are noticeable for a very long time. I started using this product year round, and it helps! I don't even dry my legs off as I get out of the shower, I put this product on immediately and just let it soak in. One thing I will say though, is that if you paint your toenails, there is a light chemical in this that will take off your polish if you get it on your toes every day, over time. It doesn't bother me at all, but it can sure mess up a new pedicure.
customer_reviews.author: BPhillips

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: I was going to a malaria Zone with my infant son, and I got these because I needed a repellent for him since he was too young to take an anti-malarial drug. Although I didn't like the scent, this cream was really easy to use and reapply. It worked perfectly and he didn't get any mosquito bites. I will definitely purchase this for my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Afrocurlitan

customer_reviews.title: Worst customer service from seller
customer_reviews.text: The product was great but the seller stiffed me for expedited shipping which cost more than the but repellent itself...very disappointed in the seller would not recommend ordering from them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon, Joesabelle, & Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: If you get eaten alive by mosquitoes or no see ums this is a necessity
customer_reviews.text: Every time i go to Mexico or are outdoors after the sun goes down i seriously get about 30-60 bites from mosquitoes or no see ums. I applied this about 3-4 times a day for about 5 days. It smells nice and i did not get one bite! I will never go to Mexico or spend time outdoors again without buying this. I highly recommend this for anyone who is loved by mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna G.

customer_reviews.title: Stained My Clothing,  Why the 3 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love anything avon and this product is better than most in protecting against moquitos here in Florida. With that said, it is oily and it stained my pants white and top. The lid looks like it is closed but do not trust it. Put it in a zip lock to keep it from spilling on your clothing. I wish I could find a sss that is not oily and sticky.
customer_reviews.author: AIDA

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this seller/price. I paid $9 plus shipping for this small bottle. I paid $4 for the green bottle and $5 for the off spray at Walmart. I ordered it for my newborn baby since we are traveling to africa. The seal was very difficult to remove. I just hope it repels against mosquitoes and malaria for this expensive price!
customer_reviews.author: D'Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Too Good To Be True!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to try this on my toddler after the many great reviews. I put the lotion on her arms and legs for water play at school (I applied lotion 20 minutes prior). She came home with 5 mosquito bites on her legs!!! On another note, this has a strong smell, half clean and half repellent so not very pleasant. The smell lingered on my hands a long time after washing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Dissappinted, Itchy, and Sunburnt
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return it, but it is ineligible for returns. Used itfor the first time today, and I'm currently looking at my over a dozen bug bites, sitting proudly on my sunburn. It did smell ok, but that is the only thing good.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Worked in the Jungle in Nicaragua
customer_reviews.text: Used during a surf trip in Nicaragua where we stayed in a national forest. Didn't get 1 bite, where as I'm usually dinner for every mosquito.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: When we travel down to FL we are bug magnets. It tends to make out trip not so enjoyable getting bitten and itchy for the duration. I hate having to apply BOTH sunscreen and bug spray too. This is the perfect solution. It is a heavy duty bug repellent as well as protect from sun. I repurchase this product as needed and strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Guile

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Avon Skin So Soft, and I wanted to buy more because it's effective as an insect repellant. Was delighted to see Avon now mkes one specially for the job. I'd been spraying myself with "OFF" at night whenever I suspected there was a mosquito in my bedroom. Now I use Sin-So-Soft and I smell a lot better (to myself, even if mosquitoes don't like the smell)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hughes

customer_reviews.title: I'm super bug sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I'm super bug sensitive!! I've used the original skin so soft for year's. We went camping for a week. This is great day time stuff. The only reason I didn't give it a 5☆ is because it's a little thick and heavy for about the first 15 min. But it did do the job. Definitely re apply as directed.
customer_reviews.author: 29forever

customer_reviews.title: Versatile winner for bugs and skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing stuff, sunscreen with bug repellent and lotion all in one. This is like a Swiss army knife of skin products for living in Arizona. I remembered the brand name from 30 years ago growing up in Alaska because the ladies didn't like using Off or Repel to keep the Alaska State Bird - the Mosquito - from biting them. Those products are like pouring jet fuel on your skin... so they would buy from the Avon sales rep a similar product. When my wife complained about bug bites in our back yard I immediately thought of this and placed an order. Now she's happy and you know the saying, happy wife = happy life.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant scent, very creamy
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothly. Very creamy texture and not an overpowering scent, just a pleasant one. Helps with all insect pestering except for deer flies in my personal experience. Cap stays secure, but simple to open. A little bit of lotion goes a long ways and doesn’t irritate my skin. Fits nicely in my purse or beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Cornett-McVay

customer_reviews.title: I don't think they like the smell or something
customer_reviews.text: Been lucky and have not had to test this for the bug I bought it for... knats! But to my surprise.... it repels biting horse flies while fishing. I've (unfortunately) had to test it on 3 different occasions. After being driven crazy being bit by horse flies, I applied this and they would mainly buzz my legs, land occasionally but take off without biting. I don't think they like the smell or something. Don't really care. As long as it works! I originally bought 2 bottles. Ordered 3 more since. Only wish it came in a bigger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well. The bugs love me, they can't wait for me to come "anywhere" outside. This product stops them in their tracks. Since wearing it, they leave me alone! What a pleasure to go to the pool and not have to scratch all day. No scent, blocks the rays and I don't have to walk around with any anti-itch cream.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in Belize against sand fleas and mosquitoes. Only time my girlfriend and I were bitten was when we weren't protected by this stuff! Will definitely by buying more for the next tropical adventure. I had also treated our clothes with Sawyer Permethrin Spray to protect us wherever we didn't apply this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I received it & it’s freaking cracked open & I leave for my trip Saturday morning. I’m pissed. Half of the bottle leaked in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product - it works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! My daughter and I get eaten alive by mosquitoes. We welt and bruise - it's awful! This stuff has allowed us to be outside for 5 hours and not 1 bite!!! It's a plus that there is also spf to it, we haven't had any sunburns either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not like the original avon product from years back. It is oily, feels heavy on the skin, does not repel mosquitoes as it states. I always use a sunscreen product or 30-50 rating so this was no problem. Not a good bug repellent. Prefer the citronella oil you can apply to skin without that heavy lotion feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Don’t ever stop making this!
customer_reviews.text: I always keep this stocked, especially in the summer! Having a dog who loves walking in the grass means my legs are the perfect delicacy for mosquitoes! Since purchasing this - I no longer have 13 mosquito bites per leg during summer months. I recently came back from visiting family in St. Lucia and this was a mandatory product in my luggage. Unlike most repellants, the smell is also quite pleasant which is an added bonus! I recommend to anyone who mentions that they need a great repellent.
customer_reviews.author: Maximiv01

customer_reviews.title: The smell bugs after a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: Skin so smelly and soft perhaps... it works as a bug repellent though. It kinda gets everywhere: hands, eyes, tongue, food—even after thorough soap washing. In the end though, I'd rather have this on my face (eyes, tongue and food) than the bugs it repels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Something that works
customer_reviews.text: I have been bitten by mosquitos mercilessly the past several years. After trying every spray, towelette, and repellent accessory in the market g th his is, so far, the only thing preventing the bug bites + it smells nice and has a good consistency, very light. Ask me in August big so far this is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this repellent for years. I was super happy to see it still exists, now my infant was able to use when we got to South America where all those ravenous mosquitoes were waiting patiently for fresh meat. Glad to say, it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Mosquit-owned
customer_reviews.text: I put this on me and my two boys while we were playing in the yard and the mosquitoes didn't care. I have half a dozen welts from mosquito bites and each of them have several. Oh well, back to using good old fashioned DEET.
customer_reviews.author: maddiedog

customer_reviews.title: I'm one of those people that the mosquitos absolutely love. Everyone around me can be perfectly fine
customer_reviews.text: I've searched for years for a product that would keep the mosquitos off me, and I finally found it!!! You have no idea the relief I felt going to the beach this year and not getting eaten alive. I'm one of those people that the mosquitos absolutely love. Everyone around me can be perfectly fine, and I have 50 bites. Not this year! Thanks to this product, I only have one bite and it's on my neck, where I didn't put this lotion. Also, I think it smells nice. Some warned me that it smelled bad, but I don't agree.
customer_reviews.author: sallen

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Kept the mosquitos off me, but make sure that you get every inch of skin. Once, I guess when I did my feet I didn't get the sides and a couple got me. Not much of any kind of scent to it (good or bad, in my opinion), and after it's applied it leaves no lingering scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey V.

customer_reviews.title: Bug stopper!
customer_reviews.text: Avon Skin So Soft bug repellent with sunscreen worked better than expected. I only got bit when I went out without putting it on. I was in the jungle areas of Cancun for a week and came home with only a handful of bites. Normally I would be covered with bites after using a popular bug spray with deet. I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe this product works at all. I feel like it attracts the mosquitoes to me even more when it is on!!! I got bit where I put the lotion every time. I also would get bit where I didn’t put lotion because it would attract them to me. Don’t waste your money.. try something else!
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: I cannot stress enough how great this product is
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for the past two summers, and I keep reaching for it again and again! I cannot stress enough how great this product is. I have sensitive skin, so having a lotion that works for me is very important. The most important feature for me, however, is the bug repellent feature. In general, I am the one person who gets bitten the most in a group of people. With Avon, I can usually leave unscathed (or have just one bug bite because I forgot to apply the sunscreen on my ankle)! And as an added bonus, the Avon has a gentle scent compared to other sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Best big repellent
customer_reviews.text: The only lotion, spray, ect that actually keeps mosquitos off. I live in Hilo, Hawaii where we have rain every other day so we have a lot of mosquitos & they love my son & he gets big welts when bitten. I rub him with this lotion when he goes outside to play & he doesn't get bothered at all. The smell is nice too, not like those other harsh chemical repellents.
customer_reviews.author: Tee94

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells so nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. It smells great, applies smoothly, and isn’t too thick. I find I have to really apply it everywhere- if I miss my ankles, they will get mosquito bites. But where it’s applied, I find it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: FranklySpeaking

customer_reviews.title: Great for sun AND mosquito protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after using it this past summer while in a sunny, humid, mosquito ridden place. I bought it solely for the fact that it is a 2 in 1 product (genius idea). I only give it 4 starts bc it doesn't absorb all the way like many sunscreens so you have to take a little bit longer to wash it off than you would with normal sunscreen. Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We just moved to the country. While mowing my arms got bit up terrible. I always liked sss so I thought I would give it a try. It really works, not one bite. Plus its a sunscreen, also moisturizes and it doesnt smell too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie

customer_reviews.title: BEST STUFF EVER
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this DEET-free sunblock/insect repellant-in-one on our trip to the Caribbean - BEST STUFF EVER. Worked GREAT; no bug bites, no sunburn! Left my skin feeling super soft. And Best of All - the mild scent didn't bother my allergies - what a Relief! We visited Wyndham's Margaritaville Resort and found out that the staff there uses Avon SKIN-SO-SOFT Bug Guard exclusively - they ship it to island by the case!
customer_reviews.author: T. Long

customer_reviews.title: Product is old
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product right after I received it. When I open it up that the oil starts dripping out the bottle, the texture isn’t smooth, oil and water sepreration. For my experience that tells me this cream is bad. I don’t think that I’ll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde E. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: It's more insecticide than lotion.
customer_reviews.text: I get mostly insecticide smelling grease out of the bottle. I really don't like giving bad reviews but even after you get pass the awful smell it doesn't even work. I still get mosquitoes swarming around me and still get bug bites when they get the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good and doesn’t irritate eyes
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, the content is not to much so I had to be very careful to use only the necessary amount to make it to the whole vacation time. I didn’t feel any discomfort in my eyes, I didn’t apply near the eyes, only in the rest of my face.
customer_reviews.author: Naika

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of the great reviews. I wore it for 2 consecutive days and started developing dermatitis on my arms, which has never happened with any other insect repellent or sunscreen. Don’t purchase if you have even moderately sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bug repellent
customer_reviews.text: This works beautifully for keeping bugs away. Normally bugs think the bug repellent I'm wearing is just barbecue sauce. They leave me alone when I'm wearing this. No mosquitoes, flies or ticks want me when I'm wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: Ozarkrider

customer_reviews.title: 2 products in 1!
customer_reviews.text: I love this insect repellent. Ive been using it since my children were infants. I ran out and needed something quick. So I bought an other insect repellent and sunscreen from walmart. I didnt compare, my children got bit by mosquitos bad!. I ordered this product and per the usual, it did not disappoint. I will admit that it is more expensive than other repellents but its a sunscreen as well. So you save money by not having to buy 2 products. It also last a long time. One bottle usually last me at least one season.
customer_reviews.author: brittany l.

customer_reviews.title: Was able to go outdoors again
customer_reviews.text: My son recently returned to Florida and was unable to go outdoors in the evenings due to mosquitoes. This product made all the difference. Back outside where he wanted to be.
customer_reviews.author: leh

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! I've been getting bitten by bugs left and right die to the warmer weather and I swear the big bites nowadays are so crazy that it hurts and leave welts. The only relief is sleeping on ice packs. My coworker told me about this product and I quickly ordered them. So far so good. No new bites!!! I will be stocking up on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Wu

customer_reviews.title: Bug repellant and sunscreen in one
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen! Bug repellant and sunscreen in one. It does melt when it gets hot so be aware if you bring it to the pool and shake before using!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for my family. The mosquitoes here (Texas) are so bad. My poor 18 month old is a magnet for mosquitoes even after spraying his arms and legs with bug spray. They always went for his face. This is gentle enough and doesn’t have a strong scent to put on his face.
customer_reviews.author: Nixxi7

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my one year old son and myself as I burn VERY easily. Protected us all day and I actually watched mosquitos and other bugs fly over to us and fly right back away never landing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, but greasy.
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. A little oily/greasy feeling. Only downside that I didn’t think of prior to purchasing was that you can’t put it on your clothes so mosquitoes still get you through your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Bain

customer_reviews.title: Great all-in-one lotion.. with a non-headache inducing scent!
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have sunscreen and bug repellent all built into one lotion! I used this for my trip to Thailand and it worked great! The smell is light and did not give me a headache (I am quite sensitive to scented products). It also was not greasy, which was nice because both the deet and 20% Picaridin I tried were a bit greasy and also way too smelly! I highly recommend this product and will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: I love the product, but absolutely hate the smell!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and bugs mosquito's are really bad here, so when I got this I immediately put it on, and the creepy, flying crawlie blood suckers didn't touch me, but oh, man the smell gave me a headache. I tried to send it back, that day, but this is one of those products that when you buy it, it's yours.
customer_reviews.author: B Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t repel mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen worked fine to prevent sunburn, but did not repel mosquitoes at all. The product itself was very runny and had an overpowering scent that wasn’t my favorite, but it didn’t seem to irritate my sensitive skin, so that’s a plus. You would probably be better off going for a more price effective choice of sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: E M I L Y

customer_reviews.title: We had quite a few people put this on last ...
customer_reviews.text: We had quite a few people put this on last night at our annual neighborhood 4th of July Gathering but the mosquitoes had a feast with us. from ages of 2 months to almost 60 multitude of nationalities and race and the mosquitoes did not discriminate on home to Feast on
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Does not repel as well as the original lotion
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the convenience of the sunscreen/ bug repellent combo. Surprisingly it doesn't repel mosquitos as well as the skin-so-soft lotion. It's ok as a sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our impending vacation to Texas, which had to be postponed 3 times due to Covid. We finally left on July 8th. We never used this, had it in a ziplock and it leaked all inside the bag. I cleaned it up, tightened the lid as much as possible and it still leaks when it stands up. It may be too late but I’d love to have a new one, If possible, don’t trust this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my toddler who goes outside a couple times a day at daycare. Wanted to limit the amount of "stuff" we were putting on her but the Houston sun/bug combo makes it impossible to do without. Product has a pleasant scent and pretty much keeps the bugs at bay. Remember to apply every 2 hours or so for the bug repellant to work. Slightly greasy but I'll deal with that over using products with Deet on her! 3 stars is due to my disappointment with the seller charging double shipping when both of my SSS items were shipped in the same package. C'mon really? Besides that...four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Sunblock
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen was order on March 15, 2020 and received a bottle that expired September 2020. First time using it and it came out all oily like it was already expired. Item cannot be returned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dao

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Cannot return.
customer_reviews.text: Oil separates from lotion and your body gets oily and sticky. Not sure if it protects you from sun much. Do not recommend. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I needed the SPF/bug protection at a camp I was working at. It exceeded my expectations. I usually get EATEN ALIVE the moment I go on a hike or outside in general. I did reapply at times when I would get sweaty or after the pool. The scent is not overbearing. I can put it on before going on an outside walk and it is not too sticky. I will definitely be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Miranan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Took it with me to Belize where the mosquitoes are the size of small dinosaurs and chase you like hornets. I was worried it wouldn't be strong enough but it worked great. Needs to be re-applied once or twice throughout the day. It has none of the usual horrible chemical smell, just feels like a nice light moisturizer, but was strong enough to ward off even those nasty disease carrying beasts.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Forget the bugs with this Stuff, it snuffs them out so bad you can't even hear their buzzing/flying by like with most Sprays!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps all bugs, even large 3 inch horse flies away! Cutter won't do that on its own, the horsefly is so big it should be called an Aligator Biting Fly, eyes big as my fingernails, those critters do not like this, no flies, mosquitoes but mostly those pesky biting large Horseflies can't stand this stuff. Pit it on when laying out or just on, it will not let you down!
customer_reviews.author: Pam B.

customer_reviews.title: BEST Bug Deterrent
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST way to keep those pesky biting bugs away. The only thing I use and the only thing that has worked on my daughter and granddaughter, as well.
customer_reviews.author: SherryG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Stuff doesn't help to keep mosquitoes away from me. Slightly effective for flies. Attracts gnats. Really not very useful. But bug spray doesn't work for me either. The mosquitoes just are too determined when it comes to my blood for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Slater

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We were in the woods in the worst of mosquito season. We cut our walk short because there were so many mosquitoes buzzing around us but I got out with not one bite. I also like the sunscreen and moisturizer. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bugs be gone !!
customer_reviews.text: Prior to using this product I was getting eaten alive by mosquitoes. Just be careful to keep bottle upright and shake it before using product.
customer_reviews.author: nml

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t think I’d like this bug repellant because nothing has ever worked for ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think I’d like this bug repellant because nothing has ever worked for me. However, this has exceeded my expectations. I got only 3 mosquito bites which is rare because I usually end up with at least 20. It was gentle on my sensitive skin and it has sunblock which was a major plus! It was also gently enough for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Diana mattson

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Not for sport use. It is carried off with heavy sweat. Works wonders round the fire but use the aerosol for activity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two in one
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact that we had to apply only one lotion for a State park camping and hiking. We were camping in the woods and hiked through the woods, applied it during day time and didn’t get bitten during that time.
customer_reviews.author: amazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Baby must have
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 month old, bugs bite the heck out of her. This has worked great so far, I also like that it has sunscreen in it as well and is water proof. I have tried A LOT of other baby appropriate bug repellent with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Snow

customer_reviews.title: Good option for bug protection and sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good option when gardening, gives you skin protection from the sun and bugs. Easy to use, pleasant smell. It does stay a little sticky but not too bothersome. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JLY

customer_reviews.title: Mosquitoes no more and I smell good too
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped me everytime I’ve used it. Love the light smell. I’m very proned to mosquitoes, they will find me in a room full of people. You must shake before use. It’s oily, but I sometimes use it as a daily lotion if I go to beach often.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J.

customer_reviews.title: Just the 2 in one product I always wanted
customer_reviews.text: Brought this on a recent beach trip in the British Virgin Islands, and it's great as a bug repellent and sunscreen. Highly recommend for effectiveness and it smells nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brisson

customer_reviews.title: This Works
customer_reviews.text: Used on a hot wet muggy day as I did yardwork for hours: zero mosquito bites. (But 4 hundred kajillion fireant bites couldn't be avoided, dangitt.)
customer_reviews.author: TanyaBo

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 bite!
customer_reviews.text: Mosquitoes usually feast on my delicious blood in the great outdoors. Even with spray and bracelets on. I am happy to say i only had one bug bite while camping! Pleasant smell and no sunburn to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Scooba

customer_reviews.title: Dual purpose
customer_reviews.text: This serves as a dual purpose as it is a bug repellent and sun block. Great for vacation in outdoor areas or camping.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Works on DEET immune mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those people who the mosquitoes find tastier than others. I think the mosquitoes in my area are immune to DEET, so slathering myself in it not only was distasteful but didn't work. Skin so soft smells decent and seems to make me invisible to the mosquitoes, so I can actually go in my yard again without long pants and sleeves. The only place I've gotten a bite so far while using it was my face because I neglected to apply the lotion there. I wish Skin so soft came in gallon jugs.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Works better than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This really does keep the bugs away. I could be swarmed in the middle of Antarctica. This product really works. If traveling keep the lid upright or use a bag because the oil will seap out after you have broken the seal. And shake before using to mix the oil back into the sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: William Holton

customer_reviews.title: Put On Early Before Going Out
customer_reviews.text: Nice blend of sunscreen/bug control. However, In a hot/humid climate, it does come to the surface of your skin so put on at least an hour before going out. Also, will sting your eyes w/ sweat so take along dome Visine in your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical that this lotion would actually work, but this stuff keeps the bugs AWAY--mosquitos, gnats and black flies! I love it! The only thing I would change is that the SPF was higher especially since I use it on my face also. I plan to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Not Happy

customer_reviews.title: The scent is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - just a lotion, which is what I was looking for. Just a normal lotion that has insect repellent in it. Avon is a good brand, but the scent in this is way too strong and sickening sweet. I had to take a shower to get rid of the scent. Bummer that it isn't returnable - money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this combination sunscreen, lotion, and big guard. It did each of those things well. It smells nice without being overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W.

customer_reviews.title: Best product!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for sun and bugs. I used it in Florida, Japan, and Costa Rica and no sunburn or bug bites. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Szczepaniak

customer_reviews.title: It’s true.  Skin so Soft keeps bugs away.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears this when he golfs. He has tried numerous products to keep bugs away and says Avon’s product really works. It also smells great and feels great. We both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gebbie

customer_reviews.title: Decent scent, kind of works
customer_reviews.text: It has a decent scent, has a smooth application, very moisturizing. Still isn't as good as products like Off! or Clutterbug (something like that). But it's better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to this summer. Not only does this keep the mosquitoes away but i have the healthiest looking skin.
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is great, esp. for southern summers.
customer_reviews.text: i have lived in the humid , hot and bug infested south my whole life. This stuff is excellent, especially for kids going to summer camp and the beach/vacation. Essentially it is two products in one and it works. It is mostly water resistant and you should reapply it if you or your child goes swimming but it really repels bugs, and knats and keeps you from getting sunburnt. As far as I know, Avon is the only cosmetic company with such a product. Kind of pricey , but worth every penny. A southern mainstay , helps the nasty summer be a little less nasty....

product_meta.description: 4 Fl oz bottle insect repellent and sunscreen lotion in one. Provides repellent to insects outdoors with protecting your skin from the sun
feature_bullets: Non greasy formula helps replenish moisture and leaves skin soft and smooth
